#summary NativeProcess is a new API present in Adobe AIR 2 that allows communication between an AIR application and native programs presents in the OS.


= Further reading =

For more informaion, you can go to the class definition on the [http://help.adobe.com/en_US/FlashPlatform/beta/reference/actionscript/3/flash/desktop/NativeProcess.html AS3 Reference for the Flash Platform].
